explanation: To complete the task of placing a perfume bottle on a toilet tank, moving a lotion bottle from the counter to the back of the toilet cover, putting a bottle on the top of the toilet tank, putting the soap on the toilet lid, getting the lotion and putting on the back of the toilet, and placing a soap dispenser on the toilet, the objects that may be involved are the SoapBottle, SoapBar, LotionBottle.
